mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.org_name as t_org_name, t.org_number as t_org_number, t.state as t_state, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.update_time as t_update_time, t.operator as t_operator, t.org_prov as t_org_prov, t.org_addr as t_org_addr
mapper.insert:
insert into organization
id,
org_name,
org_number,
state,
create_time,
update_time,
operator,
org_prov,
org_addr,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update organization
org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_number = #{orgNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
org_prov = #{orgProv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_addr = #{orgAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
